## compileHandler() function

Compile a handler into a runnable function by resolving selectors and injecting the arguments into the handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compileHandler<A extends any[], R>(selectors: Selectors<A>, handler: (...args: A) => R): (context: Context) => Promise<R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selectors | <code>Selectors&lt;A&gt;</code> | Selectors to gather handler arguments from |
|  handler | <code>(...args: A) =&gt; R</code> | Handler to be compiled |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(context: Context) => Promise<R>`

compiled handler ready to be used
